jobContext:
Description: TotalFood Processing Pvt Limited, Bangladesh (https://totalfoodprocessing.com) is a state-of-the-art shrimp and fish processing factory located in Rupsha, just on the outskirts of divisional city Khulna, 170 km from the capital city Dhaka, beside the Khulna-Dhaka Highway. The seaport is just 30km and the airport (under construction) is just 10km away from the factory premise. The area covers approximately 20 acres of land under our TotalFood title.  The factory is designed with extensive and rigorous consultations with various local and international experts. It is our ambition to become a game changer in the Bangladesh Shrimp processing industry. 
More About Us: Our UK business, TotalFood Distribution Limited, has been operating since 1996. We have a purpose-built cold storage facility with a fleet of refrigerated company branded vehicles for distribution of our products, covering London and the South East of England. We distribute a wide range of frozen products to our customers who are restaurants, wholesalers, cash & carry outlets, small distributors and retail outlets
Sr. Technician (Electrical) is responsible for day to day operation & maintenance work of the Electrical Section and all other Electrical works of the TFPPL. His prime responsibility is to attend complaints coming from the production & Utility section and inform the Project Engineer / Senior Project Engineer /Lead Project Engineer about the problem and solve this problem according to instruction of the Project Engineer/Senior Project Engineer/Lead Project Engineer.

The seaport is just 30km and the airport (under construction) is just 10km away from the factory premise. The area covers approximately 20 acres of land under our TotalFood title.  The factory is designed with extensive and rigorous consultations with various local and international experts. It is our ambition to become a game changer in the Bangladesh Shrimp processing industry.
